Reviews.Title: Got for overseas use
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Currently deployed, I got this phone to use on the Roshan network. Would highly recommend for anyone in Afghanistan to use for quick texting. Sound quality is very good, and the full qwerty keyboard is slight raised to avoid pressing multiple buttons at once.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast 3G connectivity via AT&T;'s HSDPA/UMTS network (850/1900 MHz bands; 3.6/7.2 Mbps speeds with network availability).
GPS navigation capabilities via AT&T; Navigator service includes audible turn-by-turn directions, real-time traffic updates and re-routing options.
2.4-inch LCD screen (320 x 240 pixels, 262K color depth); Full QWERTY keyboard
1.3-megapixel camera with video capture capabilities (15 fps)
80 MB internal memory (shared between MP3 player and camera)
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Link P7040 Black 3g Ultra-slim Qwerty Keyboard At&t Gsm Unlocked
